citation.article-title: Transfer of [Flexibacter] sancti, [Flexibacter] filiformis, [Flexibacter] japonensis and [Cytophaga] arvensicola to the genus Chitinophaga and description of Chitinophaga skermanii sp. nov.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Chitinophaga filiformis comb. nov.
Chitinophaga filiformis (fi.li.for′mis. L. neut. n. filum a thread; L. suff. -formis like, of the shape of; N.L. fem. adj. filiformis thread-shaped).
The description is identical to that given by Reichenbach (1989) with the additional chemotaxonomic data provided by Hamana & Nakagawa (2001) and this study.
The type strain is strain Fx e1 ReichenbachT=ATCC 29495T=CCUG 12809T=CIP 106401T=DSM 527T=HAMBI 1966T=NBRC 15056T.
